name: Acute Necrotizing Autoimmune Pancreatitis with Systemic Inflammatory Response
chief_complaint: I have unbearable abdominal pain and I can't stop vomiting
symptoms: severe epigastric pain radiating to back
prognosis: Guarded - 40-60% mortality without prompt intervention. High risk of multi-organ failure.
description: A rapidly progressive form of pancreatitis with autoimmune and necrotic components, triggering a cytokine storm and systemic inflammatory response. Characterized by pancreatic parenchymal destruction, vascular compromise, and high risk of infected necrosis.
